title: 3 Days to Kill 2014 DVDR R4 NTSC
description:
A former secret agent discovers that he is dying. So he decides to abandon his dangerous career to improving the relationship with his family during his last months of life. Beside Vivi Delay (Amber Heard), he must capture the most guarded terrorist in the world in just three days.
